About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project is in safe hands

A web developer's role is responsible for designing, coding and modifying websites, from layout to function and according to a client's specifications. He should Strive to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation. With deep knowledge on HTML5, CSS3, JS,Angular JS, and different backend developement languages, I am a good choice as your next web developer.

Major Project

Completed my project "Smart Shopping Cart" using Apriori algorithm and Machine Learning under RAYRC PVT. LTD.

Internship

Completed my internship in year 2019 at NALCO, Angul under CPP Department.

Minor Project

Created my own File System using Scala in year 2020.
